page.title: 10A Weekend Day
page.content: On Sunday the day starts off slowly, not like in the week when we have to rush to get ready for school! When the whole family is awake we decide what to do for the day . Often we phone a friend to see what his family is doing and arrange the day together. One Sunday after our bacon and egg break fast, we met our friends and walked the dogs across Southport and Birkdale golf links. We threw sticks for the dogs to fetch. There is a large pond nearby where there are Natterjack toads;it was here we stopped to have a picnic. After eating,we played French cricket. At 2pm. we went home to wash and change for a birthday tea for my Great Grandma who was 90 years old. There were many relatives there. We had a lovely tea-party and everybody sang Happy Birthday when Grandma cut the cake.
